document.full_text: japan's victoire pisa won the $10 million world cup by a half length saturday, capturing the world's richest horse race to provide a lift for the disaster-ravaged country.
document.title: japanese horses run first and second in richest race, the world cup
lines_and_colors: japan's victoire pisa won the $10 million world cup by a half length saturday, capturing the world's richest horse race to provide a lift for the disaster-ravaged country.
